name: Twista
description: Twista from Denver’s Green Solution is a sativa-dominant strain with energetic, focused effects and a high THC content. Its powerfully invigorating effects, colored by Twista’s sweet citrus aroma, stay cerebrally locked for the duration of the buzz. This sativa won 3rd place in the 2014 Denver Cannabis Cup and is thought to descend from the Flying Dutchman’s Twister strain.
descriptionPlain: Twista from Denver’s Green Solution is a sativa-dominant strain with energetic, focused effects and a high THC content. Its powerfully invigorating effects, colored by Twista’s sweet citrus aroma, stay cerebrally locked for the duration of the buzz. This sativa won 3rd place in the 2014 Denver Cannabis Cup and is thought to descend from the Flying Dutchman’s Twister strain.

highlightedReviews.text: I got some live res Twista from TGS, and it is amazing! Taste is perfect blend of citrus with hints of a piney, skunk flavor.  one of the best tasting concentrates I've tried
Fun Fun!! A friend and I truly enjoyed this strain while vacationing in CO. Euphoric and silly, great for laughing and goofy conversation. Makes you want to dance!

articles.title: The 2014 Denver Cannabis Cup Winning Flowers
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Another 4/20 has come and gone, and with it passes another High Times Cannabis Cup. This year’s Denver Cannabis Cup recognized six categories of top-shelf flowers with indicas, sativas, and hybrids divided into two subcategories that separated medical strains from other local legends. We hope you had a chance to visit the Leafly booth while you were at the Cup, but if you missed this weekend’s festival altogether, here’s a list of the 2014 champions.
Have you tried any of these winners? Does it deserve its place in the Hall of Fame? Don't forget to share your thoughts in a review!
Best Medical Hybrid


1st Place: Pure Power Plant from Good Meds Network

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Earthy, skunky aroma
Clear-headed, euphoric, and creative effects
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 10 weeks

2nd Place: Chem Crush from La Contes
3rd Place: Golden Goat from the Green Solution
 
Best U.S. Hybrid


1st Place: Cookies & Cream from Exotic Genetix

Hybrid cross between Starfighter and a GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies) phenotype
Sweet flavor and aroma
Long-lasting relief for patients treating symptoms throughout the day

2nd Place: Colorado Chem from Cannables
3rd Place: A cross of Cinderella 99 and White from Natural Remedies
 
Best Medical Sativa


1st Place: Jilly Bean #1 from Standing Akimbo

Sativa cross between Orange Velvet and Space Queen
Tangy orange and mango aroma
Upbeat and happy effects
Indoor flowering time of 8 weeks

2nd Place: Durban Poison from Denver Relief
3rd Place: Cherry Pie from The Clinic
 
Best U.S. Sativa


1st Place: Ghost Train Haze from Green Man Cannabis

Sativa cross between Ghost OG and Neville’s Wreck
Sour citrus and floral aroma
Good for pain, depression, and appetite loss
Low doses are conducive to concentration and creativity
Indoor flowering time of 65 to 80 days

2nd Place: Super Silver Haze from Life is Good Healing
3rd Place: Twista from The Green Solution
 
Best Medical Indica


1st Place: Larry OG from MMJ America

Indica cross between OG Kush and SFV OG
Earthy, lemon, and citrus aroma
Produces a potent yet functional body buzz

2nd Place: Raskal OG from Colorado Alternative Medicine
3rd Place: Denver Maple from Ballpark Holistic Dispensary
 
Best U.S. Indica


1st Place: South Central LA from Colorado Alternative Medicine & Root Seller Seeds
2nd Place: Grand Daddy Purple from Cannables
3rd Place: MK Ultra from The Green Solution
 
People's Choice Cup


1st Place: Presidential Kush from The Green Solution

Indica cross between OG Kush and Lemon Skunk
Skunky, citrus aroma
Balanced cerebral and body effects 
Good for treating insomnia or stress
Indoor flowering time of 8-9 weeks

2nd Place: Death Star from New Age Medical
3rd Place: Sour Diesel from Walking Raven Retail Marijuana Center
Image Source: Pokalhaufen via photopin cc
